attributes.action: Find and stop the supply of ISIL weapons rather than begin world war 3.
attributes.additional_details:
Instead we should be cutting off the supplies for them feeding their destructive needs.
As Corbyn said, starting a war is far less effective than cutting off the supply lines for their weapon.
attributes.background:
I believe "An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind" - Ghandi.
This is a petition against closing UK borders from immigrants as it is not an immigrant issue because ISIS members evidently already exist in the UK. As a British citizen I am afraid world war 3 being around the corner.
